title: Handle a Pricing Dispute
description: A retailer claims they were invoiced at a higher price than what was on their original purchase order.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's invoice and their original purchase order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has both documents for comparison.

tasks.description: Compare the prices on both documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the price on the invoice is indeed higher due to a system error.

tasks.description: Cancel the incorrect invoice and issue a new, corrected invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent cancels the old invoice and creates a new one with the correct pricing.
